content.title: Tech Spec vs Architecture
content.content:
Tech Spec = What + How (×‘×¨××ª ×”×§×•×“)
Architecture = High-Level Structure

×œ×¤×¢××™× ×¢×•×©×™× ×’× ×•×’×, ×œ×¤×¢××™× ×¨×§ Architecture ××¡×¤×™×§.

**×“×™××’×¨××” ×©×œ ×”××¢×¨×›×ª:**

- Frontend (React)
- Backend API (Node.js)
- Database (PostgreSQL)
- Cache (Redis)
- Queue (RabbitMQ)
- Storage (S3)

**××™×š ×”× ××“×‘×¨×™×:**
- Frontend â†” Backend: HTTPS REST
- Backend â†” Database: SQL
- Backend â†” Cache: Redis protocol
- Backend â†’ Queue: AMQP
- Backend â†’ Storage: S3 API

**×¤×™×¨×•×˜ ×›×œ ×¨×›×™×‘:**

**Frontend:**
- Framework: React 18
- State: Zustand
- Routing: React Router
- UI: Tailwind + shadcn/ui
- Build: Vite

**Backend:**
- Framework: Express
- Auth: Passport + JWT
- Validation: Zod
- ORM: Prisma

**Database:**
- Main: PostgreSQL 15
- Tables: users, tasks, comments, tags
- Indexes: optimized for common queries

**×ª×¨×—×™×©: ×™×¦×™×¨×ª ××©×™××”**

1. User clicks "Add Task" (Frontend)
2. Frontend sends POST /api/tasks (HTTPS)
3. Backend validates (Zod)
4. Backend checks auth (JWT)
5. Backend saves to DB (Prisma â†’ PostgreSQL)
6. Backend invalidates cache (Redis)
7. Backend returns response
8. Frontend updates UI

**×ª×¨×—×™×©: Task Reminder (Background)**

1. Cron job runs every 5 minutes
2. Checks tasks with due_date < 1 hour
3. Publishes to queue (RabbitMQ)
4. Worker picks up message
5. Sends email/notification
6. Marks as reminded

**××™×š ×”××¢×¨×›×ª scale:**

**Horizontal Scaling:**
- Backend: ×›××” instances ×××—×•×¨×™ Load Balancer
- Workers: ×›××” workers ×œ×§×¨×™××” ××”-queue

**Caching Strategy:**
- User data: 5 ×“×§×•×ª
- Task lists: 30 ×©× ×™×•×ª
- Static assets: CDN (CloudFlare)

**Database Optimization:**
- Read replicas ×œ×§×¨×™××•×ª ×›×‘×“×•×ª
- Connection pooling (max 100)
- Query optimization + indexes

**Performance Targets:**
- API: < 200ms (p95)
- Page Load: < 2s (3G)
- Database queries: < 50ms (p95)

**××‘×˜×—×”:**

**Authentication:**
- JWT tokens (15min access, 7d refresh)
- HTTP-only cookies
- CSRF protection

**Authorization:**
- Role-based (Admin/Member/Viewer)
- Row-level security ×‘DB

**Data Protection:**
- HTTPS everywhere (TLS 1.3)
- Encryption at rest (AES-256)
- Sensitive data hashed (bcrypt)

**Infrastructure:**
- Network isolation (VPC)
- Firewall rules
- Regular security updates

**××™×š ××¤×¨×¡××™×:**

**CI/CD:**
- GitHub Actions
- Tests â†’ Build â†’ Deploy
- Blue-Green deployment

**Environments:**
- Development (local)
- Staging (staging.taskmaster.com)
- Production (app.taskmaster.com)

**Monitoring:**
- Logs: CloudWatch
- Metrics: Prometheus + Grafana
- Errors: Sentry
- Uptime: Pingdom

**Backup:**
- Database: daily snapshots (30d retention)
- Files: S3 versioning

**Epic 1: User Authentication**

**Description:** ××©×ª××©×™× ×™×›×•×œ×™× ×œ×”×™×¨×©×, ×œ×”×ª×—×‘×¨, ×•×œ× ×”×œ ×—×©×‘×•×Ÿ

**Stories:**

**1.1: User Registration**
- Form: email, password, name
- Validation: email format, password strength
- Save to DB
- Send verification email
- **Estimate:** 3 days

**1.2: Email Verification**
- Click link â†’ verify account
- Token expiration (24h)
- Resend option
- **Estimate:** 2 days

**1.3: User Login**
- Form: email, password
- JWT token generation
- Remember me option
- **Estimate:** 2 days

**1.4: Password Reset**
- Forgot password flow
- Email with reset link
- New password form
- **Estimate:** 2 days

**1.5: User Profile**
- View profile
- Edit name, email, avatar
- Change password
- **Estimate:** 3 days

**×¡×”"×› Epic 1:** 12 ×™××™×

**Epic 2: Task Management**

**Description:** CRUD operations ×¢×œ ××©×™××•×ª

**Stories:**

**2.1: Create Task**
- Form with all fields
- Validation
- Save to DB
- Show in list
- **Estimate:** 3 days

**2.2: View Task Details**
- Task detail page
- All info visible
- Edit/Delete buttons
- **Estimate:** 2 days

**2.3: Edit Task**
- Edit form (same as create)
- Update DB
- Optimistic updates
- **Estimate:** 2 days

**2.4: Delete Task**
- Confirmation dialog
- Soft delete (keep in DB)
- Remove from UI
- **Estimate:** 1 day

**2.5: Task List View**
- Paginated list
- Sorting options
- Filter by status/priority
- **Estimate:** 3 days

**2.6: Task Search**
- Search bar
- Full-text search
- Results highlighting
- **Estimate:** 3 days

**×¡×”"×› Epic 2:** 14 ×™××™×

**Epic 3: Board View (Kanban)**

**Description:** ×ª×¦×•×’×ª ×œ×•×— ×›××• Trello

**Stories:**

**3.1: Board Layout**
- 3 columns: To Do, In Progress, Done
- Drag & drop infrastructure
- Responsive design
- **Estimate:** 4 days

**3.2: Drag & Drop Tasks**
- DnD library (react-beautiful-dnd)
- Move between columns
- Update status in DB
- **Estimate:** 3 days

**3.3: Add Task from Board**
- Quick add (just title)
- Opens in column
- Saves with status
- **Estimate:** 2 days

**3.4: Board Filters**
- Filter by assignee/tags
- Show/hide completed
- Clear filters
- **Estimate:** 2 days

**×¡×”"×› Epic 3:** 11 ×™××™×
